mapper.select: SELECT t.id AS id, t.userId AS userId, t.identityCard AS identityCard, t.name AS NAME, t.phone AS phone, t.email AS email, t.password AS PASSWORD, t.avatar AS avatar, t.smallAvatar AS smallAvatar, t.provinceId AS provinceId, t2.name AS provinceName, t.cityId AS cityId, t3.name AS cityName, t.registerTime AS registerTime, t.updateTime AS updateTime, t.active AS active, t.status AS STATUS, t.addr AS addr, t.clientId AS clientId FROM t_user t LEFT JOIN t_common_region t2 ON t.provinceId = t2.id LEFT JOIN t_common_region t3 ON t.cityId = t3.id WHERE t.id = #{id}

SELECT t.id AS id, t.userId AS userId, t.identityCard AS identityCard, t.name AS name, t.phone AS phone, t.email AS email, t.password AS password, t.avatar AS avatar, t.smallAvatar AS smallAvatar, t.provinceId AS provinceId, t1.name as provinceName, t.cityId AS cityId, t2.name AS cityName, t.registerTime AS registerTime, t.updateTime AS updateTime, t.active AS active, t.status AS status, t.addr AS addr, t.clientId AS clientId FROM t_user t LEFT JOIN t_common_region t1 on t.provinceId = t1.id LEFT JOIN t_common_region t2 on t.cityId = t2.id WHERE phone = #{phone} AND password = #{password} AND status = #{status}
SELECT t.id AS id FROM t_user t WHERE phone = #{phone} limit 0,1
